abstract: Shareholders of bankrupt Washington Mutual asked a federal judge for permission to investigate JPMorgan Chase for its role in the failure of Washington Mutual Bank, Reuters reported.
snippet: Shareholders of bankrupt Washington Mutual asked a federal judge for permission to investigate JPMorgan Chase for its role in the failure of Washington Mutual Bank, Reuters reported.
lead_paragraph: Shareholders of the bankrupt Washington Mutual asked a federal judge for permission to investigate JPMorgan Chase for its role in the failure of Washington Mutual Bank, Reuters reported, citing court documents filed on Tuesday.

headline.main: WaMu Shareholders Want to Investigate JPMorgan
